activities:
Mobi Wireless Management collects the following kinds of personal information from our clients:

Contact Information such as name, email address and shipping address
Unique Identifiers such as user name and password
HR information provided by the client such as cost center, title and managerial hierarchical information
Phone numbers and device identifiers (serial numbers) of lines and devices we manage
Billing and usage information from carrier bills

We use this information to, fulfill orders, facilitate approval processes, send order confirmations, ship devices directly to users, respond to customer service requests, administer accounts and drive business rules off HR data given by our clients. 

Phone numbers, device identifiers and billing/usage data are used to provide reports to clients, guide program optimizations for cost savings, and provide audits according to guidelines outlined by our clients.

Mobi Wireless Management may transfer personal information to companies that help us provide our service. We use third parties in instances where we collect billing information to process payments, and to provide users with customer support outside of normal business hours. 

Mobi Wireless Management will retain personal data we process on behalf of our clients for as long as needed to provide services to our client. Mobi Wireless Management will retain and use this personal information as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.

personaldata: On-line data, Offline data, Manually processed data
recoursemech:
TRUSTe EU Safe Harbor Program.
Furthermore, Mobi Wireless Management, LLC has agreed to cooperate and comply with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) to investigate unresolved complaints.
